karma.title: Karma System
karma.description: Technical documentation of the {siteName} points system
karma.beta_notice: ⚠️ This system is in Beta phase and open to community debate and suggestions.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: Karma is a scoring system that reflects the quality and consistency of your participation in {siteName}. Unlike other systems, we implement mechanisms to prevent manipulation, ensuring that karma reflects real contribution.
overview.feature_2: Progressive reduction of old content to incentivize continuous activity
overview.feature_4: Recent activity bonus to reward consistent participation

posts.title: Posts
posts.diminishing: Diminishing returns: After 10 votes, logarithmic factor log(n+1)/log(11) is applied. This prevents a single viral post from generating disproportionate karma, incentivizing multiple quality posts. For example, 100 votes generate ~233 karma (not 1000), and 1000 votes generate ~289 karma (not 10,000).
posts.comment_bonus: Bonus for received comments: 1 point per comment (max 25)

comments.title: Comments
comments.downvote: Downvote: -1 point (minimum 0 total karma per comment). Downvotes have less impact to protect against downvote brigading.
comments.diminishing: Diminishing returns: Same as posts, after 10 votes
comments.reply_bonus: Bonus for received replies: 1 point per reply (max 12). Incentivizes comments that generate constructive conversation.

activity.title: Activity Bonus (last 30 days)
activity.description: Consistent participation is rewarded with additional points to incentivize users who contribute regularly, not just those with one-time successes.
activity.votes: Votes cast: 0.1 points each (voting also helps curate content)
activity.example: Example: 5 posts + 20 comments + 100 votes in the month = 45 bonus points.

age_decay.title: Age Decay
age_decay.description: Karma from old content decreases progressively to incentivize continuous participation and prevent inactive users from maintaining high karma indefinitely. The system applies these multipliers based on content age:
age_decay.note: A post from 18 months ago that generated 100 points now contributes 70 points to your total karma. New votes received will also be calculated with this multiplier.

seals.title: Community Seals
seals.description: Users with sufficient karma level receive weekly Seals that they can use to highlight quality content or advise against content. Seals also affect the karma of the content author.
seals.advised_against: Advised Against Seal: -2 karma to author
seals.rule_1: Only users of Apprentice level or higher receive seals
seals.rule_4: You cannot mark your own content
seals.rule_5: You can only apply one seal of each type per content
seals.rule_6: If you remove a seal, you recover the point and the karma is reversed
seals.impact: Seals allow the community to highlight quality content and advise against content in a visible way, while incentivizing authors to create valuable content.

levels.title: Levels and Multipliers
levels.description: Upon reaching certain karma thresholds, your level increases. When you vote on other users' content, your level grants a small multiplier that slightly increases the karma they receive:

viral_post.title: Example 1: Viral Post
viral_post.old_system: System without diminishing returns: 1000 votes × 10 = 10,000 karma
viral_post.conclusion: Incentivizes creating multiple quality posts instead of chasing virality

content_decay.title: Example 2: Age Decay
content_decay.scenario: A post with 20 upvotes (200 base karma):
content_decay.conclusion: The system incentivizes creating new content constantly

deleted_content.title: Example 3: Deleted Content
deleted_content.scenario: A post receives 10 community reports and is deleted by moderators
deleted_content.karma_lost: Author loses all karma earned from that post (~100-200 karma)
deleted_content.strike: Also receives a strike. 3 strikes = temporary suspension
deleted_content.conclusion: The system heavily penalizes content that violates rules

technical.title: Technical Details
technical.formula_comment: karma_comment = max(0, (diminishing_returns(upvotes - downvotes) × time_mult + reply_bonus) × age_decay)
technical.formula_total: karma_total = Σ karma_posts + Σ karma_comments + activity_bonus
technical.diminishing: diminishing_returns(n) = n ≤ 10 ? n × base : base × 10 × log(n+1)/log(11)
technical.note: Calculations are performed in order: diminishing returns → time multiplier → bonus → cap → age decay
